title: Should drinking alcohol while pregnant be an offence?
teaser: In the UK a long-running court case has reignited the debate over drinking while pregnant - and whether doing so to excess should be considered a crime. The case has sparked a wider debate about the ethics of potentially criminalising pregnant women who turn to drink. We hear from a sufferer of foetal alcohol syndrome (FAS) and a group of mums.
